pager.nextL: js; let nextNum = fun.getOne('.page').innerText; nextNum = parseInt(nextNum.match(/\d*(?=\/)/)) + 1; let b='.html'; let ph = String(nextNum)+ b; let url = location.href.replace(/(?<=\d\/).*/,ph); console.error('宅男女神_m: ',ph,url);return url;
js; let url = fun.getOne('.cur+a').href; return url

js; let nextNum = fun.getOne('.page').innerText; nextNum = parseInt(nextNum.match(/\d*(?=\/)/)) + 1; let b='.html'; let ph = String(nextNum)+ b; let url = location.href.replace(/(?<=gallery\/).*/,ph); console.error('宅男女神_m_gallery: ',ph,url);return url;

mm.tvv.tw.style: .blog-listing {position: relative !important;float: left !important;top: auto !important;left: auto !important;} .blog-title>a {white-space: nowrap;overflow: hidden;text-overflow: ellipsis;} .blog-image img {min-height: 300px;}
